title: Lab equipment not working
description: The oscilloscopes in Electronics Lab 2 have been malfunctioning for the past week. Unable to complete experiments.
author: Arjun Nair

responses.message: Technician has been assigned. Expected fix by Friday.

title: Water supply issue in Block C
description: No water supply in Block C, 3rd floor since yesterday evening. Multiple rooms affected.
author: Vikram Singh

title: Food quality concerns
description: The dinner quality has significantly dropped. Rice is often undercooked and vegetables are not fresh.
author: Divya Sharma

title: Wrong marks in DBMS end-sem
description: My answer sheet shows incorrect marking in Q3 and Q5. Requesting reevaluation.
author: Priya Patel

responses.message: Reevaluation request received. Will be processed within 7 days.

title: Library AC not working
description: The air conditioning in the reading room has been broken for 3 days. Extremely uncomfortable for long study sessions.
author: Meera Krishnan
